title: BRIEF-India's Bandhan Bank Receives Approval For Gruh Finance's Merger With Co
text:
BRIEF-India's Bandhan Bank Receives Approval For Gruh Finance's Merger With Co

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 21:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Bandhan Bank Receives Approval For Gruh Finance's Merger With Co Sept 27 (Reuters) - Bandhan Bank Ltd says: * INDIA'S BANDHAN BANK SAYS RECEIVES NATIONAL COMPANY LAW TRIBUNAL APPROVAL FOR GRUH FINANCE'S MERGER WITH CO Further company coverage: BANH.NS (Mumbai Newsroom)

BRIEF-India's Bandhan Bank Receives Approval For Gruh Finance's Merger With Co
description: BRIEF-India's Bandhan Bank Receives Approval For Gruh Finance's Merger With Co
